message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. This is a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, $700,000 is significantly below what I believe the product is worth. I'm willing to compromise and come down to $850,000. This reflects the value I place on the product and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement.  Let's work towards a deal that benefits both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $850,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $825,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and our previous discussions.
